> [armchairgenius](#comment_1_1DW9EhqZ7rndNKZTPbdxsttBU1jGtT2soT): Ah great, more of the "only evil people use Tor" mantra. Does better encryption and privacy allow people to access things like CP? yes it does, but that's the price of freedom.

Amen. I proudly host three separate Tor nodes across the world. As with anything great, there will always be the small percent that will abuse the system for something.
